title: So, as a returning player to this game.
body:
MATCHMAKING:

> I am thoroughly disappointed with the matchmaking.
> 
> I'm still trying to learn the game, have made it to level 18 and i'm constantly matched against players that are in their 100's queueing with fresh accounts so they can stomp players like myself.
> 
> Why is this even a thing? if you are queuing with a level 30+ go play level 30+ games... Don't come into a new player game just to deter players from playing the game by constantly trash talking them and making their gameplay un-enjoyable..
> 
> Riot, you really need to address this system and start enforcing some kind of punishment to players who abuse the system just to negatively impact new players that are just trying to learn the game.
> 
> Regards,
> A returning player who may not return at all.
> 
> p.s. you are an utter piece of trash if you think stomping new players is a good way to play this game, if new players quit the game then wheres the future in it?

BOTS:

> Asian account farmers love riot, they have hundreds apon hundreds of bots in ARAM games every day, They sell them off for $$$ and then riot bans the poor person that bought the account.

replies.body:
Agree with the bots.

They are everywhere in the 1-29 bracket of Coop and ARAM.

Chinese account farmers are making thousands of dollars a day because riot are too pathetic to do anything about it.
This is also my new account, but I do not find matching particularly unfair. Most of them are likely to be silver - plat players. They are far from being any good .
